doc.field: U.S. BUSINESS LOANS RISE 377 MLN DLRS

- Business loans on the books of major U.S. banks, excluding acceptances, rose 377 mln dlrs to 279.085 billion dlrs in the week ended March 4, the Federal Reserve Board said. The Fed said that business loans including acceptances increased 484 mln dlrs to 281.546 billion dlrs.
